alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Greene; Lenoir; Martin; Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 6:12PM EDT until August 15 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR GREENE...NORTHERN LENOIR...PITT...MARTIN AND NORTHWESTERN BEAUFORT COUNTIES... At 611 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Scotland Neck to near Tarboro to 7 miles east of Wilson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Kinston, Washington, Winterville, Williamston, Ayden, Farmville, La Grange, Bethel, Grifton, Stokes, Snow Hill, Bell Arthur, Robersonville, House, Shelmerdine, Pactolus, Calico, Black Jack and Bruce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
